children.name: Economic Development
Reduce peak period travel times
Average travel time during AM and PM peak periods on major corridors
children.pm: Average travel time during AM and PM peak periods on major corridors

children.name: Increase transportation investment focusing on economic vitality
children.objective: Increase transportation investment which focuses on economic vitality

children.name: Change in employment/economic output in areas with new/improved transportation facilities
children.pm: Change in employment or economic output in areas with new or improved transportation facilities

children.name: Improve reliability of travel to regional activity centers
children.objective: Improve reliability of travel to regional activity centers

children.name: Planning Time Index (95th percentile travel time / free-flow travel time)
children.pm: Planning Time Index (95th percentile travel time / free-flow travel time) to/from activity centers

children.name: Increase multimodal access to regional activity centers
children.objective: Increase multimodal access to regional activity centers

children.name: Percentage of population within ½ mile of transit routes serving activity centers
children.pm: Percentage of population within ½ mile of transit routes serving activity centers

children.name: Reduce freight bottlenecks
Average truck travel time index (TTTI) on freight-priority corridors
children.pm: Average truck travel time index (TTTI) on freight-priority corridors

children.name: Expand and maintain regional network of sidewalks, bike lanes, and trails
children.objective: Expand and maintain a regional network of sidewalks, bike lanes, and multi-use trails

children.name: Total miles of sidewalks, bike lanes, and multi-use trails regionwide
children.pm: Total miles of sidewalks, bike lanes, and multi-use trails regionwide

children.name: Equity/Accessibility
Reduce trip lengths with focus on EJ populations
children.objective: Reduce trip lengths for all people with a focus on Environmental Justice (EJ) populations

children.name: Average trip length by mode and population group (EJ vs. non-EJ)
children.pm: Average trip length (in miles or minutes) by mode and population group (EJ vs. non-EJ)

children.name: Increase access to jobs/services via transit, walking, biking for EJ populations
children.objective: Increase access to jobs and community services via transit, walking, and biking for all people with a focus on EJ populations

children.name: Percentage of EJ population within ½-mile walk of frequent transit service
children.pm: Percentage of EJ population within a ½-mile walk of frequent transit service

children.name: Number of jobs accessible within 30 minutes by transit/walking/biking (EJ vs. non-EJ)
children.pm: Number of jobs accessible within 30 minutes by transit, walking, or biking, disaggregated by EJ vs. non-EJ populations

children.name: Safety
Reduce motorized fatalities and serious injuries
children.objective: Reduce the number and rate of motorized fatalities and serious injuries

children.name: Total number of motor vehicle fatalities (annual)
children.pm: Total number of motor vehicle fatalities (annual)

children.name: Total number of serious injuries from motor vehicle crashes
children.pm: Total number of serious injuries resulting from motor vehicle crashes

children.name: Fatality rate per 100 million VMT
children.pm: Fatality rate per 100 million VMT

children.name: Serious injury rate per 100 million VMT
children.pm: Serious injury rate per 100 million VMT

children.name: Reduce non-motorized fatalities and serious injuries
children.objective: Reduce the number of non-motorized fatalities and serious injuries

children.name: Non-motorized fatality/serious injury rate per capita or per 100,000 population
children.pm: Non-motorized fatality and serious injury rate per capita or per 100,000 population

children.name: System Management
Improve condition of all bridges
children.objective: Improve the condition of all bridges

children.name: Percentage of NHS bridges (by deck area) in good condition
children.pm: Percentage of NHS bridges (by deck area) in good condition

children.name: Percentage of NHS bridges (by deck area) in poor condition
children.pm: Percentage of NHS bridges (by deck area) in poor condition

children.name: Improve lane miles of pavements in good/poor condition
children.objective: Improve the lane miles of pavements in good and poor condition

children.name: Percentage of Interstate lane miles in good condition
children.pm: Percentage of Interstate lane miles in good condition

children.name: Percentage of Interstate lane miles in poor condition
children.pm: Percentage of Interstate lane miles in poor condition

children.name: Improve percent of transit vehicles/facilities in good/poor condition
children.objective: Improve percent of transit vehicles and facilities in good and poor condition

children.name: Percentage of transit revenue vehicles exceeding useful life benchmark
children.pm: Percentage of transit revenue vehicles that exceed useful life benchmark (ULB)

children.name: Percentage of non-revenue vehicles exceeding useful life benchmark
children.pm: Percentage of non-revenue vehicles exceeding ULB

children.name: Percentage of facilities rated below 3.0 on FTA's TERM scale
children.pm: Percentage of facilities rated below 3.0 on FTA's TERM scale (Transit Economic Requirements Model)

children.name: Environment
Reduce transportation-related pollutants
Total tons of transportation-related emissions per year (CO₂, NOₓ, VOCs, PM2.5)
children.pm: Total tons of transportation-related emissions per year (CO₂, NOₓ, VOCs, PM2.5)

children.name: Emissions per capita or per vehicle mile traveled (VMT)
children.pm: Emissions per capita or per vehicle mile traveled (VMT)

children.name: Reduce impact on environmentally sensitive areas
children.objective: Reduce impact of plan on environmentally sensitive areas

children.name: Acres of environmentally sensitive land impacted by transportation projects
children.pm: Acres of environmentally sensitive land directly impacted by funded or programmed transportation projects
